translations.translation: those who do not associate anything with their Lord,
Who do not associate any one with their Lord,
who associate none with their Lord in His Divinity,
who consider nothing equal to their Lord,
And those who do not ascribe any partner to their Lord –
And those who join not anyone as partners with their Lord;
And those who do not associate (aught) with their Lord,
and those who associate naught with their Lord
And those who ascribe not partners unto their Lord,
and do not ascribe partners to Him;
And those who with their Lord associate not anyone.
and do not ascribe partners to their Lord;
Those who join not (in worship) partners with their Lord;
And those who join not anyone (in worship) as partners with their Lord;
who associate none with their Lord,
And those who associate no partners with their Lord.
And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
[23:59] and who do not associate others with their Lord,
(And those who ascribe not partners) idols (unto their Lord) for these We hasten with good things;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لاَ يُشْرِكُونَ } [المؤمنون: 59] بل يستقلونه بالوجود ولا يثبتون لغيره وجوداً
 ولا يسندون الحوادث إلى الأسباب العادية بل يسندون كلها إليه أولاً
 وبالذات

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ والذين هم بربهم لا يشركون } شركاً جلياً ولا خفياً
 بخلاف مشركي العرب والعجم
 { والذين يُؤتون ما آتَوْا } أي: يعطون ما أعطوا من الزكوات والصدقات
 وقرئ: يأَتُونَ مَا أَتَواْ بالقصر
 أي: يفعلون من الطاعات
